HomePage.title: Telos: Intelligent Agent Process Orchestration Platform
HomePage.subtitle: A modern, scalable platform for intelligent workflow orchestration
HomePage.description: Enables automated task scheduling and management. Features frontend-backend separation and a microservices architecture, ideal for enterprise automation scenarios.

features.title: Core Features
features.frontend: Frontend powered by Next.js 15 and Shadcn UI for a seamless user experience.
features.backend: Backend built with Go microservices for high performance and scalability.
features.communication: Supports tRPC/gRPC for type-safe, efficient inter-service communication.
features.monorepo: Monorepo management for unified dependencies and streamlined collaboration.

frontend.title: Frontend Technology Stack
frontend.nextjs: Next.js 15 – Utilizes App Router for server components and optimized routing.
frontend.shadcn: Shadcn UI – A Tailwind CSS-based component library for rapid, responsive UI development.
frontend.typescript: TypeScript – Strongly typed language for enhanced code stability and maintainability.
frontend.trpc: tRPC – Enables type-safe API calls between frontend and backend.
frontend.zustand: Zustand – Lightweight state management for complex interaction logic.

backend.title: Backend Technology Stack
backend.go: Go – High-performance, natively concurrent, ideal for microservices.
backend.gin: Gin/Echo – Lightweight HTTP frameworks for rapid API development.
backend.grpc: gRPC – High-performance RPC framework based on Protobuf for inter-service communication.
backend.postgresql: PostgreSQL – Relational database for structured data storage.
backend.redis: Redis – In-memory cache for fast data access and task queueing.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.docker: Docker – Containerized deployment for consistent environments.
infrastructure.kubernetes: Kubernetes – Cluster orchestration for automated deployment and scaling.
infrastructure.helm: Helm – Kubernetes package manager for simplified application deployment.
infrastructure.monitoring: Prometheus & Grafana – Monitoring and visualization system.
infrastructure.tracing: Jaeger – Distributed tracing for service call chain analysis.

gsap.animation: Stunning entrance animation powered by GSAP!
